messages.speech:
There are many reasons why people have epilepsy. Often it is impossible to define the cause. Some causes include: 
- acquired brain injury - loss of oxygen (hypoxia)
- infections such as encephalitis
- strokes, tumours or cysts 
- cerebrovascular degeneration in the elderly 
- genetic causes. These may be inherited in the family or they may be caused by a new genetic abnormality that occurs during the earliest stage of foetal development.
